bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks --Amendment: Provider Backbone Bridge Traffic Engineering (IEEE Draft Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2005)

IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks --Amendment: Provider Backbone Bridge Traffic Engineering (IEEE Draft Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2005)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802-1Qay/D5-0, Jan 09

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment supports provisioning systems that explicitly select traffic engineered paths within Provider Backbone Bridged Networks.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
